QuestData.Title: Death to the Vilebranch
QuestData.Description: We won't give them a chance to react. You must re-enter Jintha'Alor and charge all the way to the upper tiers.$B$BThe Vilebranch berserkers and shadowcasters are dangerous enemies, $n. When the others see their bodies thrown across the walls, they'll know we mean business.$B$BDon't leave any Vilebranch hearts beating!
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill 5 Vilebranch Berserkers and 5 Vilebranch Shadowcasters in Jintha'Alor.
QuestData.RewardText: It won't be long until we're the only trolls left breathing on these walls.
